reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The app clearly mentions in its Privacy Policy that it collects various types of information directly from users through multiple channels.
reply.reference: WeVibin will use and share your personal information with third parties only in the ways that are described in this Privacy Policy Statement. a. To provide you with Services and to analyze and improve our Services. URL: https://wevibin.co/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects web-behavior information such as pages visited on the website through tracking technology like cookies and similar technologies and user information related to the testing services including data on the usage of wearable devices.

content: Web-behavior information (pages visited on the website)
User information related to testing services (usage data of wearable devices)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the collection of web-behavior information through tracking technology and user information related to testing services. These data types are explicitly provided in the document.
reply.reference: The app collects web-behavior information such as pages visited on the website through tracking technology like cookies and similar technologies and user information related to the testing services including data on the usage of wearable devices. URL: https://wevibin.co/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by contacting the Privacy Administrator at privacy@WeVibin.com, clicking the 'unsubscribe' button in promotional email communications, or deleting their WeVibin account and personal information within their WeVibin Account Settings.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can opt out of data collection or delete their data through various methods provided within the app.
reply.reference: You can opt-out at the browser or device level, or by contacting our Privacy Administrator at privacy@WeVibin.com. You can also click the 'unsubscribe' button at the bottom of promotional email communications, as applicable. If you no longer wish to participate in our Services, or no longer wish to have your personal information be processed, you may delete your WeVibin account and personal information within your WeVibin Account Settings. Once you submit your request, we will send an email to the email address linked to your WeVibin account detailing our account deletion policy and requesting that you confirm your deletion request. URL: https://wevibin.co/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares information with third parties in various contexts, such as service providers, analytics, aggregate information sharing, and in the case of business transactions. This sharing is described under the 'Information we share with third parties' section of the privacy policy.
reply.reference: We share the information described above in Section 2 with our third party service providers...Our service providers act on WeVibin's behalf. We implement procedures and maintain contractual terms with each service provider to protect the confidentiality and security of your information....We may share Aggregate Information, which is information that has been stripped of your name and contact information...In the event that WeVibin goes through a business transition such as a merger...URL: https://wevibin.co/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with third party service providers in areas such as order fulfillment and shipping, customer care support, and cloud storage, IT, and security.

content: Order fulfillment and shipping service providers
Cloud storage, IT, and security service providers

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that the app shares data with third party service providers in various areas, ensuring the necessary support and services are provided to users.
reply.reference: General service providers. We share the information described above in Section 2 with our third party service providers, as necessary for them to provide their services to us and help us perform our contract with you. Service providers are third parties (other companies or individuals) that help us to provide and improve our Services. While WeVibin directly conducts the majority of data processing activities required to provide our Services to you, we engage some third party service providers to assist in supporting our Services, including in the following areas: Order fulfillment. URL: https://wevibin.co/privacy-policy
